hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -q 'plans/.*\.md'; then echo 'ACTION REQUIRED: Plan file written. Run verify-plan-criteria to validate acceptance criteria coverage before proceeding.'; fi

echo 'SPEC-DRIVEN DEVELOPMENT ACTIVE: (1) Every task in an implementation plan MUST include **Acceptance Criteria:** with machine-verifiable - [ ] items. After writing a plan, run verify-plan-criteria. (2) Before claiming any task is complete, run verify-acceptance-criteria to mechanically check all criteria against the codebase.'

hooks.prompt:
Review the conversation. Answer TWO questions:

1. Did the assistant IMPLEMENT code changes (create files, edit files, write code) based on tasks from an implementation plan that has acceptance criteria (- [ ] items)?
2. Was the verify-acceptance-criteria skill invoked during this session?

If the answer to #1 is YES and #2 is NO, respond with EXACTLY:
BLOCK: Code was implemented from a plan with acceptance criteria, but verify-acceptance-criteria was not run. Run it before ending this session.

If #1 is NO (no implementation was done, just research/discussion/planning), or #2 is YES (verification was already run), respond with EXACTLY:
pass
